website_summaries.verdict: OXO is known for its ergonomic design, and this potato masher is no exception. A wavy loop of stainless steel wire cuts right through the potatoes, but will not scratch the bowl.
pros: Feels very comfortable in hand, and allows for heavy pressure
Potatoes do not clump or bunch together on masher
cons: End of handle has some "flex" – not ergonomic
Wide spaces between loops can leave some larger pieces
May not fit in some kitchen drawers

customer_reviews.title: Mashes stuff 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This thing mashes. It does the job that's for sure. I also like to wield it at my husband and threaten to brand him with it. Not sure if it has any value as a "branding" tool though. TBD. For guacamole though it cannot be beat! I mash the hell outta those avocados. It's got a really solid heft to it and the wires are far apart enough that it's really extremely easy to clean. Doesn't seem like it'd be easy to hurt it. We put ours in the dishwasher, not sure if that is recommended but ours survived just fine on the bottom rack.
customer_reviews.author: Gooj

customer_reviews.title: Potato excalibur will give you confidence
customer_reviews.text: Your potatoes are no match for this potato masher. It glides through with no resistance and the hold of it makes you feel unstoppable. My roommates were so impressed the one day I made mashed potato. It had changed my life for ever. I anticipate the feel of the easy grip handle for it is like the hilt of a potato slaying excalibur. The masher cleans so easy , no longer will we have you waste ,like 20 mins, picking and scrubbing the potato carnage from it. Everyday has changed for me since I know I no longer have to live in fear any potato. I sit here at 2 am with great confidence to tell you this.
customer_reviews.author: Coty Barath

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great masher - gets the job done easily!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a great potato masher for my girlfriend, who got into making a delicious mashed cauliflower/potato (~50% of each). Until using this masher, she was using a rubber whisk! I have to say, this masher does exactly what it needs to do - great mashing ability with no frustrating build-ups of potato (or cauliflower) while you are mashing. Much better than our previous tool of choice. This masher is also very easy to clean by hand, as there are not any tight spaces that are hard-to-reach. Also, it's dishwasher safe if you prefer that. Overall, a great masher for the price, and I would not hesitate to recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: I’ll Never Need Another
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a plastic masher that I’d had and always hated. The grate in that masher had holes that were impossible to clean and the handle was very short. This masher by OXO is amazing. The handle is the perfect length for a good grip and leverage. The metal grate is a squiggle so it does a great job mashing but it also super easy to rinse and wipe clean. It doesn’t look like it would be super study but it is very well made and I don’t think I’ll ever need to buy another masher...unless I want 2 of these!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job. I used it to break up veggies in a chowder and did what I wanted it to do. Figuring it will do the job with mashed potatoes when the time comes to make them. Good size. Nice grip. Long enough to mash to the bottom of a large pot of soup with out burning my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Much better than your traditional circle mashers that have square holes
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and much easier to clean than a circle masher with holes in it. Stainless steel cookware is where its at. I am glad we bought this. Definitely an improvement. Cant go wrong with oxo for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Time for a new potato masher!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been married a long long time and I guess I’ve gone thru a couple potato mashers. The one I had now was all black plastics & did a mediocre job. I use it to mash up other veggies & work dough in the beginning. I needed several new utensils & decided on the OXO brand for their reputation & the use of other kitchen items I own. This masher works great & is comfortable to hold. Makes it a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: RestlessHeartTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke, but company replaced under warranty
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I emailed OXO about the problem and they apologized and promptly sent me a replacement under warranty. Changing my rating from 2 starts to 4 stars due to the excellent customer service. The handle came apart in less than 3 years of light use. The rubber part slid off of the plastic part (yes, it's plastic in the handle, not metal). Looks like it was held in place only by some glue. Engineers could have easily made the bond permanent either with stronger adhesive/epoxy or a different physical design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favourite style of masher
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. This style of masher works so much faster and easier than a flat headed masher. It took some searching to find this style of masher but it was worth it! Works great for mashing potatoes but I also use it to mash tomatoes while they are cooking when I make homemade pasta sauce. Using this type of a masher allows me to get exactly the consistency that I want. Very pleased with my purchase. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar potato masher. This item is approximately 1" smaller in width, and it is extremely hard to push through cooked potatoes. I never had a problem with my old masher. Not impressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have gotten one of these years ago
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten one of these years ago. I have a recipe that requires mashing cooked squash. This makes it so much easier and uniform with so much less effort. I found it easy to hold and very easy to clean. I ma please with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: azhirise

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: For several years now I've been using a new (supposedly more modern?) style of potato masher. I couldn't stand it anymore. Went back to this traditional style one now my mashed potatoes are so much better! Feels better in my hand, works better at mashing and I have no trouble cleaning it altho I make sure to rinsing or soaking it right away after using.
customer_reviews.author: M. Agloro

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this predominately for mashing potatoes, hamburger, squash, etc. It is not very sturdy, thus requiring more time to re-squash the vegetables, especially potatoes. I'll shop elsewhere to find one that does the job in a far better fashion. One gets what one pays for, spend a couple of dollars more. A good side, the handle is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Breck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a potato masher that had bent between the handle and the business end. This one is great. It's much stronger, better designed, and easier to clean than my other one. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Great masher!
customer_reviews.text: This item makes mashing potatoes so much easier! Before, I had a full plastic one with the mesh style masher, but this is so much better and easier to clean!! You won't be disappointed in the quality of this masher and the grip is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use; east to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great for one person servings. I like mashed spuds with a little character, not perfectly smooth. I can have mashed potatoes in under a minute and cleanup takes only seconds. Nice for camping as the only power needed is your arm.
customer_reviews.author: twright3

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Strong, which is what you want!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, well made. Worth the couple of extra bucks over a cheap, flimsy one.
customer_reviews.author: J Dingo

customer_reviews.title: Just got it..
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale and took months to get here. Heavier than what I am used to. Have not used yet. My last one rusted so I will come back if anything like that happens and change from a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Seasons01

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as usual
customer_reviews.text: I am not old nor do I have arthritis, all the same I love the OXO good grips line. Solid tools, solid build, value pricing. All around I highly recommend anything coming from them.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, albeit a little short
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced a much, much older, wooden-handled masher of identical design. My only wish would be that the handle was longer...this is a little short for some uses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to actually use!  Great grip.
customer_reviews.text: My last masher (from a respected and pricey brand name) couldn't take the pressure-literally! One day I'm just mashing up a batch of potatoes and *snap" it's time for the trash bin. That's why I bought this masher from OXO. This one is a solid, heavy-gauge steel wire that goes all the way up into the sturdy handle. I'm not sure I could break it if I tried! Works great at mashing (just as good as one with square or circle holes), and the large grip makes it easy to hold even if you get a little butter on your hands (trust me, I have done it).
customer_reviews.author: David Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother-in-law when I was visiting. I went to mash potatoes when I was visiting him. His potato masher piled up on top of it and was frustrating to use. He was happily surprised when it arrived in the mail for him.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda LaRouche

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Got for mashed potatoes. Works great but sometimes it takes awhile depending what youre using it on. Dishwater cleans it great. A little awkaward to wash by hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid masher with excellent grip
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worse than a weak potato masher so my wife insisted on an OXO branded one. This one is really firm with no flex when mashing and a really good grip on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gannon

customer_reviews.title: All mashed up
customer_reviews.text: Potatoes? Mash em! Sweet potatoes? Mash em! Cauliflower? Gtfo. It's a potato masher you guys. There are no moving parts, there's zero brain power... just mashed up carbs! It's almost thanksgiving- you know you want those garlic mashed potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to clean but it is very sturdy. When you need to mash potatoes there is nothing worse than looking for one of these and not having one. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Jaren

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy masher that will meet your needs.
customer_reviews.text: You need to mash some potatoes? How about refried beans? This is the masher for you. Its sturdy strong and comfortable. The handle feels great and it does not stress my tiny Trump-like hands. You shall love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pantocrator

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, old-fashioned style of potato masher, which produces the type of mashed potatoes I remember from my childhood. What it has, though, that ones from many years ago did not is the OXO ergonometric design, with a comfortable handle. It also contains a hole at the top of the handle for hanging on a rack. This is excellent not only for potatoes, but for apples, carrots, various kinds of squash, turnips and other soft-cooked fruits and vegetables. The masher is made of durable stainless steel that helps you avoid rust.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McMurryTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Familiar old workhorse, improved
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle especially because I'm a senior. My old masher had a painted wooden handle, and the paint chipped, then the handle began to degrade. It was a little hard on the wrist. This OXO potato masher is easy on the wrist, and is comfortable to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: CPV

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this potato masher. It is weighty with a super comfy grip handle. Works like a charm. OXO is always my go to for kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.author: SugarMagnolia45

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I am in love, so much easier than the plastic one I had. I actually was able to make way too many mashed potatoes for Christmas this year.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Mashes the taters just fine. Good handle, nice grip but it’s a two part piece and while drying it, it accidentally came apart. No big deal...put some gorilla glue in there and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nelxon

customer_reviews.title: OXO Good Grips Wire Masher
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Several OXO Good Grips including a Lemon/Lime Reamer, Cheese Plane, Wire Potato Masher and Box Grader. They were all reasonably priced and are made of good quality material. The potato masher is the best that I have ever used and I use it for everything. I like to mix bell pepper and onions in ground beef instead of using a large spoon. Add a can of black olives in the mix and mash them up also. I would recommend this brand. The handle has a nice grip and is nice and soft. I considered this brand because I have the wire whisks and other products by OXO.
customer_reviews.author: Levelle M Laney

customer_reviews.title: Great potato masher!
customer_reviews.text: The only Oxo product I've ever purchased that turned out to be a lemon was their stainless steel dish soap dispenser. I've never seen stainless steel rust prior to that purchase but it was rusting and leaking within weeks. I contacted Oxo and they replaced it for me at no charge and the replacement dispenser hasn't had the same problems. This potato masher still looks like new after months of use. Great products and service is what always weighs heavily for me in any product purchase and why Oxo is always on my list for product comparison if they offer what I'm in search of...
customer_reviews.author: Goodneighbor

customer_reviews.title: Great potato masher!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I mash so many potatoes with this. And cauliflower. And anything that needs to be mashed really. It works really well. Way better than my old masher.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Only masher you need
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to grip, easy to clean, and mashes well. All you need! The old plastic one I had looked like a UFO and had so many grooves it took forever to clean. Great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Quenga

customer_reviews.title: Finally, and old school style potato masher!
customer_reviews.text: Beats that stupid newer style of potato masher hands down. And I didn't have to go to a yard sale or antique store to find it! The rubber handle is comfortable too! Winner.
customer_reviews.author: Hucifer

customer_reviews.title: OXO still going strong
customer_reviews.text: As with all OXO products I've used to date, this is sturdy and works well. OXO products seem to last forever as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruschak

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get the edges of the pot
customer_reviews.text: I love OXO Good Grips, and own a ton of their products. This one is solid, durable, and awesome, except it is more difficult than my previous masher to get the edges of my pot. My previous masher has a circular head, which works well for curved pots, but this one is straight and just takes a bit more effort. It really isn't a problem for me, and I still use it, but it's certainly a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Best potato masher I have ever owned! Works great to mash other foods such as ground beef. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Great masher
customer_reviews.text: Love this for mashing potatoes. Not too heavy to hold and does a great job. Cleans up well too.
customer_reviews.author: Markie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy and has a comfortable, soft rubberized grip. Works well for smashing soft vegetables and fruits.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great potato masher, but I really bought it to help break up hamburger. I love it for mashing potatoes with lumps (so good)! I like to make tacos and other hamburger meals and a wooden spoon just didn’t work for me. This is a great tool for crumbling hamburger! I am glad I found it! I am giving 5 stars! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Don Carrell

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you thiught it would be with a higher quality grip than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It served the purpose that I needed it for. There’s not much I can say here since this is a very easy tool to use and easy to clean. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: With this new tool I can mash potatoes like a pro. Ok all joking aside it is sturdy and the handle works well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Bodoh

customer_reviews.title: Good bean masher too!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this to mash potatoes much, but I do use it to mash beans and it works perfectly! On the rare occasion I do mash a potato it works for that as well. I'm a fad of the OXO Good Grips line of products, and when my former (non-OXO) masher hit the bucket I knew exactly what the replacement was going to be. I'm happy with my decision, and so are my family and friends when they eat my mashed beans!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Good masher
customer_reviews.text: This is a good potato masher. The thickness of the "wire" or whatever you call it is a little more than I would have expected. But it does a fine job of quickly mashing potatoes, which is the whole point. You'll wind up with some potato remnants between the loops if you don't scrape it off well with a spoon or something after mashing, but that's to be expected. In general, works as expected. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: ellonwheels

customer_reviews.title: Convenience order
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for convience. No great price no outstanding product. Utilitarian.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy clean, the handle is not very pretty but it does the job and its stainless.
customer_reviews.author: JZB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this - She said its the best masher she's ever used
customer_reviews.author: DezGlobal

customer_reviews.title: Memories
customer_reviews.text: This is like the potato masher my grandma used back in the day. Works better then those with holes that you can buy now.
customer_reviews.author: zeke

customer_reviews.title: material
customer_reviews.text: I like it because its made just like they did back in the 60s.
customer_reviews.author: steve lang

customer_reviews.title: fall. Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Help makes great egg salad. Much easier than using a falk.
customer_reviews.author: Ronjo

customer_reviews.title: Great masher
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean, great for mashing any veggies or fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's well built
customer_reviews.text: Feels very solid. I don't think I'll be needing to buy another in this life. I am glad I bought it. Bring on the tators!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: oldie but goodie
customer_reviews.text: Same as the old one we had years ago. Has a very good attachment to handle.
customer_reviews.author: 4 buying stuff

customer_reviews.title: Havent used, but looks great
customer_reviews.text: feel like this thing will mash the crap out of potatoes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It makes mashing potatoes so much easier. Works really well. It's sturdy, stable, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Better than a fork or a spoon
customer_reviews.text: Not really much to say besides it does a great job at smashing them potatoes in a short amount time. Prior to this, I had to use a fork or a spoon to mash up the potatoes...it wasn't fun on the hands or wrists. I wouldn't recommend using a fork and a spoon, unless you want a hand workout.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality masher
customer_reviews.text: I like OXO products, and thought I'd give this a try despite the unusual-looking mashing face. Comfortable and easy to use, and gives nice results.
customer_reviews.author: DBH

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: i don't know what i was expecting, but it exceeded my expectations. mashes well, cleans well, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, heavy thick metal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, heavy thick metal, compact, and a very comfortable feel in my hand. I have been looking for one like this for a long time, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lizlo Florida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and quick to make smash potatoes with this potato masher!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mashing Cauliflower and Potatoes.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Mashing Cauliflower and Potatoes. This also works well for making Air Fryer Smashed Salt Potatoes and leaves a nice design in the potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tonk Mom

customer_reviews.title: good one to have
customer_reviews.text: solid build. heavy, feels like it will keep for ages. mashes great and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: roee yaakobi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Still need to boil my potatoes a bit longer for them to be soft enough to mash, but this is incredibly more efficient than me and a metal fork.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great handle and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with all my mashing needs. The handle it self has a great grip and makes it easy mashing potatoes / veggies / beans. Everything is easily accessible so cleaning is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and easy to use. I highly recommend this potato masher.

customer_reviews.title: A+ Potato Masher
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect potato masher. Would highly recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Carson

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should. I made the mistake of getting a plastic one with holes and it didn't work at all. This is great.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good Grips for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Our last masher fell apart. It was not from Good Grips. Without question this masher will last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, super handy in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So long fork!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Had to get another one since my mother kept mine. She got tired of using a fork to make mashed potatoes. lol 😆
customer_reviews.author: @VS_NIEVES

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Well put together potato masher that gets the job done, overall the build quality appears good and my only real complaint is that the top of the handle is soft and buckle under pressure, a a result you can't really use your palm on top of the handle to mash down on the potatoes, which just so happens to be my preferred methods. That said, it's a personal preference, otherwise it seems well made and very functional, so 4 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: The Viking

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than it's heavy duty and works as it should. It's a potato masher. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: Quality is okay not that great, there are many other similar product available on amazon with cheaper price. Over all it’s not bad. I didn’t use this product on daily basic so far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement to our broken masher
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, solid construction, and stainless steel. 100% dishwasher safe, and works well. This product was a replacement for an old one that broke at the handle, this one I can promise you will not be breaking at the handle. The masher portion of it is pretty thick, so it does not flex or give at all, so you are not wasting any energy because of a flimsy product. Must buy if you need one, or want to replace an old one, this one Im sure will be better than 95% of any other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: Wraith

customer_reviews.title: Must have at home.
customer_reviews.text: This is great not only for potatoes, but also use it smash bananas when I bake banana-nut bread.
customer_reviews.author: ana diaz

customer_reviews.title: Mashed potatoes
customer_reviews.text: It mashed the potatoes and easy to clean so not else more to say. Worth it!!

customer_reviews.title: Mash it good.
customer_reviews.text: It mashes very well. I particularly like the grip. It feels sturdy and not too rough on the hands. I've mashed potatoes and avocados with this so far and its has perform exceptionally well. Thumbs up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for tons of cooking needs
customer_reviews.text: This has made tons of things easier - potatoes, guacamole, my odd keto diet mashups - love it!

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these good ol mothers! And this one seems really durable!

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: My parents were using a spoon to make mashed potatoes. This is easier to use.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Mashing
customer_reviews.text: If you want to mash'm this is a good solid implement.
customer_reviews.author: Biogyro

customer_reviews.title: OXO is a great brand
customer_reviews.text: I love mashed potatoes, so I needed a great masher. I knew OXO was a great brand so I knew that this masher would work great. I have had some OXO brand products for like 10 plus years. I highly suggest this and would 10/10 buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mashed potatoes and guacamole. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mollman

customer_reviews.title: Comfy like all OXO products
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable handle and works well. I bought this type over the one that has holes in it because I can imagine potatoes (and other foods) would get stuck in the small holes and it would be more work to mash.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Geist

customer_reviews.title: Nice masher
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, and it's easy to clean, to use and it's sturdy too! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BigAl

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for mashed potatoes with a nice grip on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: Mash with ease
customer_reviews.text: Although some prefer the typical mesh like masher, for a large/deep pot, I always found these grooves ones best to break through and mash up all those potatoes with ease. Much quicker too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OXO - Great Potato Masher
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mom. Sturdy as all OXO products are. Made well but not too heavy. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Much easier to mash potatoes using this and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super smasher!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's exactly what I was looking for. I wash it in the dishwasher with no troubles. It has been a great addition to my kitchen. It is sturdy and versatile. I have used it to smash up potatoes & hamburger meat . I highly recommend this kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Free

customer_reviews.title: My potatoes have been mashed.
customer_reviews.text: It mashes potatoes with the best of 'em. Really can't complain... what could go wrong? It doesn't mash potatoes?
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Airaghi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on hands
customer_reviews.text: Handle is comfortable and it’s sturdy, best one I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Doyle

customer_reviews.title: good for guacamole
customer_reviews.text: Using this potato masher for guacamole. Feels good in hands, comfortable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Stewart

customer_reviews.title: A VERSATILE LITTLE CUTIE
customer_reviews.text: Mash one or two potatoes. Combine shredded cheeses, cream cheese, and your favorite herbs for a yummy cheese ball. And THE best tool ever for chunky authentic guacamole. Get two... it makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria LC

customer_reviews.title: Ergo masher.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to finally retire my old homemade hand-welded masher made by an old family member. It was too short for average amounts of mashed root veggies. I had decided to match my new melon baller also from OXO. My OXO purchases have all been great replacements for all my antiquated kitchen tools. Nothing like working more ergonomically and efficiently as we get older.
customer_reviews.author: Average Jo

customer_reviews.title: Loved by Mom
customer_reviews.text: My mother loved this. It replaced a potato masher she had for about 40 years and she thinks this is better. Recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: TimeTravel

product_meta.title: OXO Stainless Steel Good Grips Potato Masher with Cushioned Handle, Single
product_meta.description:
The OXO Good Grips Potato Masher features a Cushioned Handle that absorbs pressure while you work, plus a sturdy stainless steel wire head. The Masher is great for potatoes, yams, carrots and other root vegetables. Or use it to mash apples and bananas for homemade baby food. Large in-handle hole for hanging storage. Dishwasher safe.

AMAZON.COM
If you're the kind of cook who prefers "mashed" to "whipped" potatoes, this tool may very well become your next best friend. With a stainless-steel wire head, the masher tackles the task at hand, all the while reducing pressure on your hands due to the soft, rubber cushioned handle that is nonslip, wet or dry. The wire masher works as well with yams, carrots, apples, or bananas, in case you've had oral surgery or have a baby in the house. Good Grips products are moderately priced and have won the Tylenol/Arthritis Foundation Design Award. --Laurie Notaro
feature_bullets: Great for mashing potatoes, root vegetables and fruit
Soft, comfortable, non-slip handle absorbs pressure
